blog.name: whovianfloozy
blog.title: The Whovian Floozy
blog.description:
My fandom name is Beachy, and this is a multi-fandom blog. 
I'm also a multi-shipper. It's likely I do not sail your ship, but I don't wank and expect visitors to play nicely as well. That includes not adding hate or negativity to my posts, altering them to suit your own ships, or removing my original comments. If you do, you will be blocked.
IRL they call me Doctor. Yep, I'm that old. Sometimes I write things that other people watch. It's all good! I like mocha latte with bourbon. A lot.

tags: please guys let me know if you're out there
i'm this close to giving up on the tumblr DT fandom
and before certain people come at me with their crap let me make something clear
hate would mean that i care
i'm simply utterly uninterested in anything to do with dt's private life
and i'm just done with it being all about georgia lately when she's done fuckall to even be relevant to me
that's not why i'm here and it has nothing to do with why i like him
if you're not turned off already please reblog lol
EDIT: likes are good and well but pls reblog to help me sprad this so i can find as many new blogs to follow as possible!!! thanks
summary: My dash has gone so quiet :(
body:
My dash has gone so quiet :(

Since I had to unfollow a bunch of blogs lately (because reasons…mostly related to point 2 on the list below tbh), I’m looking for new blogs to follow and share the DT love with.

There’s really only three things I’m asking for:

  • You post about David Tennant in some way, shape or form
  • You DON’T POST about his wife and/or family
  • You tag your posts in a fashion that allows for blacklisting

Bonus points if you actually make things like edits or gifs or anything really, but that’s not terribly important to me right now. I’m just trying to get my old community back, the one where it was all about David and his talent and work, instead of his private life.

So anyway, if this is you, reblog this post and I promise I’ll come check out your blog :)

Bonus points if you actually make things like edits or gifs or anything really, but that’s not terribly important to me right now. I’m just trying to get my old community back, the one where it was all about David and his talent and work, instead of his private life.

So anyway, if this is you, reblog this post and I promise I’ll come check out your blog :)

Since I had to unfollow a bunch of blogs lately (because reasons…mostly related to point 2 on the list below tbh), I’m looking for new blogs to follow and share the DT love with.

There’s really only three things I’m asking for:

  • You post about David Tennant in some way, shape or form
  • You DON’T POST about his wife and/or family
  • You tag your posts in a fashion that allows for blacklisting

Bonus points if you actually make things like edits or gifs or anything really, but that’s not terribly important to me right now. I’m just trying to get my old community back, the one where it was all about David and his talent and work, instead of his private life.

So anyway, if this is you, reblog this post and I promise I’ll come check out your blog :)
